Name: Infinite Children
About the game: Infinite Children is a science fiction audiobook video game about life extension. You play as members of a family questing for life extension treatments for their children - the great inheritance innovation of the age. Long-dead relatives as well as yet-to-be-born descendants alike send you messages through time, hoping to shape your way. In this American dream about the fear of being left behind, you will choose to give your child a very long life. Every time anyone got a Steam achievement, the game got longer...for everyone in the world.
